item.description: Trailhead:Take I93 exit 28 for NH Route 49 east.About 5 miles east of I93 make a left onto Upper Mad River Road,make a right onto Orris Road.We will hike counter clockwise.50% of the hike will have views,a rarity in the wooded Northeast.It's one of those modest effort-great reward hikes.This is a moderate hike.4.4 miles round trip,elevation gain 1800 feet,5 hours estimated time.Bring ski poles and traction devices. Steve
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: WELCH-DICKEY LOOP
